name: Yahtzee Bowl
description:
Yahtzee Bowl How to play

Score as many points as you can!

Points are calculated based on a dice game called Yahtzee. The goal is to make combinations out of the 5 dice, in any order.

The combinations are listed on the image on the right, along with their worth in points. Here is a summary of the possible combinations:

  • roll 3, 4, or 5 dice with the same face
  • roll 4 or 5 consecutive dice, starting from any number
  • the Full House: 3 identical dice, and a pair of dice of another value

You are allowed to reroll twice before your final score is calculated, based on the combination you have.

In this game, you also get points from making the dice ricochet off each other. So get creative!

Controls

WASD - Move character

Mouse Left click / E (near dice) - Pick up dice

Mouse Left click / E (with dice in hand) - Throw dice

Shift - Move faster

F - Toggle fullscreen
